text: Brathinus is a genus of rove beetles in the family Staphylinidae. There are at least three described species in Brathinus. ==Species== * Brathinus nitidus LeConte, 1852 * Brathinus satoi Kishimoto & Shimada, 2003 * Brathinus varicornis ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * Category:Staphylinidae
title: Brathinus
